page.description: List files in a directory and in the sub-directories of the specified directory.

argument.name: dirpath
argument.description: The URL of the directory containing the files. The directory name must end in a forward slash '/'.

argument.name: onSuccess
argument.description: A javascript function that is called when a list of files is successfully retrieved. It takes one parameter, *[js:filelist]*, an array of strings representing each file found in the hierarchy of directories. Directory names end in a forward slash.

argument.name: onError
argument.description: A javascript function called if an error occurs.
